  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b118-f520-429c-2209-d25f937896e6#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">172 Az ó-és középbabiloni művészet</string>
            <string language="en">The paleo and middle babylonian art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das paleo und die mittlere babylonian kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le paleo et l'art babylonien moyen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O paleo e a arte babylonian média</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il paleo ed arte babylonian centrale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το paleo και η μέση babylonian τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El paleo y el arte babilónico medio</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ó-és középbabiloni művészet. A korszak legfontosabb művészeti alkotásainak bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Paleo and middle babylonian art. The presentation of the most important work of art of the era</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">babiloni,  Babilónia,  dombormű,  kudurru,  </string>
            <string language="en">babylonian, Babylon, embossment, kudurru</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paleo und mittlere babylonian kunst. Die 
Darstellung des wichtigsten Kunstwerks der Ära</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paleo et art babylonien moyen. La 
présentation de l'oeuvre d'art la plus importante de l'ère</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Paleo e arte babylonian média. A 
apresentação do trabalho de arte o mais importante da era</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paleo ed arte babylonian centrale. La 
presentazione dell'opera d'arte più importante dell'era</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Paleo και μέση babylonian τέχνη. Η 
παρουσίαση του σημαντικότερου έργου της τέχνης της εποχής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paleo y arte babilónico medio. La 
presentación de la obra de arte más importante de la era</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Babylonian, Babylon, Prägung, kudurru</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Babylonien, Babylone, foulage, kudurru</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">babylonian, Babylon, embossment, kudurru</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">babylonian, Babylon, embossment, kudurru</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">babylonian, Babylon, embossment, kudurru</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">babilónico, Babylon, repujado, kudurru</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
